sentences: Akụkọ
Egwuregwu
Ihe nkiri
Nke ka ewuewu
Akụkọ
Egwuregwu
Ihe nkiri
Nke ka ewuewu
Ebe foto si, Ernest Asuzu Instagram page
Onye ejije Nollywood a ma dịka Ernest Asuzu anwụọla.
Emeka Rollas bụ onyeisi ngalaba jikọrọ ndị na-eme ejije na Nollywood, gwara BBC Igbo na ọ kubiri daa ma ghara ibilite ọzọ.
Gịnị na-esere Mike Ezuruonye na Kunle Afolayan?
Victoria Inyama: Di m na-eti m ihe tupu anyị agbasaa
O kwuru na e buru ya gawa ụlọọgwụ mana ọ nwụrụ tupu a garuo ụlọọgwụ.
Rollas kwuru na ọ nọ na-arịabu ọrịa, mana ọ gbakere tupu ọdachi a emee.
O kọwaghị ya bụ ọrịa.
Ernest Asuzu bụ onye na-eme ejije Nollywood, otiegwu, onye na-emepụta ihe nkiri nakwa onye a na-ekiri n'onyonyo kwa mgbe kwa mgbe.
A ma ya dịka onye na-akpakarị agwa dịka ogbu mmadụ n'ejije.
O bidoro wuwe mgbe o mechara ejije Nollywood akpọrọ "Another Campus Queen" n'afọ 90s.
Ọrụ ya ka dịcha ọhụrụ bụ egwu o tiputere ọhụrụ n'afọ 2020 akpọrọ "The Truth."
Asuzu bụ nwafọ Imo steeti mana o toro na Legos dị na Naịjirịa.
Ebe foto si, Instagram Screengrab
Asịrị feghariburu na Ernest Asuzu anwụọla mana ọ pụtara n'oge ahụ kwuo na ọ ka dị ndụ
A mụrụ ya n'afọ 1971 na Legọs
Mana ọ bụ onye Arondizuogu nke dị n'okpuru ọchịchị Ideato North n'Imo steeti
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ Praịmarị na St Patricks Primary School na Yaba
Akwụkwọ Sekọndịrị ya bụ na Aje Comprehensive Secondary School Yaba
N'otu oge, Ernest Asuzu rịara nnukwu ọrịa nke metụtara etu o si ekwu okwu
N'ọnwa Mee 2019, asịrị malitere ifegharị na Ernest Asusu anwụọla ma na ọ pụtara kwuo na ọ ka dị ndụ
N'ọnwa Nọvemba 2020, o tiputara efere egwu ọhụrụ nke ọ kpọrọ 'The Truth'
